Detailed Description

UITextField is a component where user can enter text.
Author:
Tapio Auvinen

char * UITextField::getText (   ) 
 

Returns copy of the content. Remember to delete the returned string after you are done with it.

Returns:
pointer to the new string, NULL if component is empty
